name: I Wanna Be Riveted
description:
I WANNA BE RIVETED
Old Man Rivet and the Rivetheads
Live at the Allan Stone Gallery
opening of the Richard Minsky exhibition
May 5, 1981

40th Anniversary, First Edition, from the lost tape
in the original, never released 1981 letterpress printed jacket

THIS NFT INCLUDES AND IS THE OWNERSHIP RECORD FOR COPY #20/75 OF A LIMITED EDITION OF THE CD IN THE ORIGINAL 7" SLEEVE THAT WAS PRINTED BY MINSKY IN 1981. Originally intended to be a vinyl 45 rpm record, but the tape was lost. It surfaced in 2020. You can read the saga and see more information about this edition at
https://www.minsky.com/riveted.htm

After collecting this NFT, use the Contact Form at
https://www.minsky.com/contact.htm
to provide your shipping address. Include your wallet ID for confirmation. You can also contact me through the Contact Form if you have any other questions.

In the event of resale of this NFT the reseller is responsible for shipping or delivering the physical work to the next buyer.
